Uses of Class
edu.cuny.cat.server.ClockController

Packages that use ClockController
edu.cuny.cat.server   
 

Uses of ClockController in edu.cuny.cat.server
 

Subclasses of ClockController in edu.cuny.cat.server
 class AutoClockController
           A class controls the game clock by automatically starting it and quitting the game both after a specified amount of time.
 class EventBasedClockController
           A clock controller that controls the clock based upon Events sent from an external source.
 class NoQuittingClockController
          This cat game clock controller works in a way similar to SynchronousClockController, but does not exit the Java system after a cat game ends.
 class SynchronousClockController
           A clock controller that starts the game clock immediately when the game controller hands over the control and quits the simulation immediately after the game completes.
 

Methods in edu.cuny.cat.server that return ClockController
 ClockController GameController.getClockController()
